Video focused on devices that are perceived as the most powerful, on a topic regarding appliances that generate heat. The video was flagged, due to the potential existence of SCP-8426 in the video.






Video Title Unknown
Man Launches Fireworks - Funny Video


12%
31%


The video displays a woman in an alleyway, wearing black clothes, with her face obscured by a hood. She holds an unknown object in her hand, points it at a wall, and then seconds later, the wall explodes in flames and the impact collapses the wall.
A man stands in his backyard, holding a set of fire crackers. He lights them all, which explode before he has a chance to throw them. He screams as he burns, as those gathered laugh at his misfortune.


Video presented a device, that when operated, applies thermal energy and propels a projective. This video appears to capture a weapon, which disqualifies the match.
Video presented a number of devices which, through the application of heat, generates directional force.






Shinkansen at Full Speed


45%


Video displays footage of the Shinkansen high speed bullet train in Japan. Footage shows the train both at rest, and at full speed.


Video matches multiple flagged traits, as a useful machine that benefits from magnetic field generation, a suspected component of SCP-8426.
